      • RobotView

        public RobotView(UbrosGame game,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas)
        Creates a view belonging to a game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game this view belongs to. Needed to access the asset manager to get textures.
        atlas - the texture atlas that contains robot animations
